text: Afro-Brazilian religions are all religions that originated in African traditional religions, which were brought to Brazil by slaves. *Babaçuê - Pará *Batuque - Rio Grande do Sul *Cabula - Espírito Santo, Minas Gerais, Rio de Janeiro e Santa Catarina. *Candomblé - In all states of Brazil *Culto aos Egungun - Bahia, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo *Culto de Ifá - Bahia, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo *Quimbanda - Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo *Macumba - Rio de Janeiro *Omoloko - Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais, São Paulo *Tambor-de-Mina - Maranhão *Umbanda - In all states of Brazil *Xangô do Nordeste - Pernambuco *Xambá - Alagoas, Pernambuco Category:Religion in Brazil
title: Afro-Brazilian religions
